attributes.action: Cancel the EU referendum result based on racism influences.
attributes.additional_details:
I also think that the slogan “give me back my Country” implies that no one else has a right to be here. I would also like to refer to the UKIP advert "Breaking Point" as evidence of racial undertones.  
I feel that racial undertones disguised as concerns for Immigration have led to an unsafe result which is unacceptable for a progressive Country.
attributes.background:
The focus on immigration has been a single negative narrative which coupled with emotive rhetoric appears to have given legitimacy to those with racist views. 
Recent news reports of attacks on other nationalities living in this country appear to reflect this.  This is now an undemocratic decision.
